channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree touching window, 4th October
item.description:
The tree outside my house needs to be cut back as it is now affecting the light in my home , it is literally touching my window

item.title: Dog fouling, 4th October
item.description:
This has been happening for the past 2 weeks. I had to poor sand over the 1st two in front of my house. I woke up this morning on 4th October to find doug fouling and excrement rubbed into the tarmac outside my driveway. This must be happening very early in the morning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Parkside Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car abandoned?, 4th October
item.description:
There has been a car parked opposite our house for over six weeks now and has not moved. No one seems to know who the owner is. Registration is GJ24OYP. Can you check to see if it has been stolen/dumped?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 122, Rowley Avenue, Blendon, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped scooter/moped, 4th October
item.description:
Could be completely innocent parking by owner, in which case there is no issue. But looks like there is a good chance the motorbike has been stolen and abandoned by the thief, there might be an owner out there who wants it back. Its parked against a wall within dellfield close (people don't typically park there). Doesn't belong to neighbours.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dellfield Close, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A large section of metal sheet roofing has been torn off the demolition site., 4th October
item.description:
During last night's (3.10.25) high winds this large sheet of debris now blown onto the pavement. The contractors contact details given to local neighbours are not responsive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Farwig Lane, Plaistow, London

item.description:

item.title: Russian Vine, 4th October
item.description:
Blackheath Golf course backs onto my garden. They have a very invasive Russian Vine it has covered all the trees over 30ft . I’ve had roots coming under my fence and I have to keep cuttings it from my fence. In the past I have had two trees fallen into my garden one was over 100ft and broke fence and shed. I’ve asked many times if they can sort the Russian Vine but it’s just spreading and completely covering the trees . Can you ask them to sort it out. Thank yoy

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 168, Green Lane, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped and obstructing pathway, 4th October
item.description:
This rubbish and waste has been here for over a month now ive reported it a number of times to fix my street and the councillors and still it remains outside my property. I feel that its unfair to have to wake up to this everyday and new we have an added issue where by foxes are contaminating and leaving feaces everywhere on it too. Please help with this ongoing issue and get it removed asap. I do believe that my neighbours have paid to have items removed and now we have additional flytipping added to it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coupland Place, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rochford Walk, Hackney, London

item.title: Greenwich Council litter, 4th October
item.description:
Greenwich council maintenance team not picking up swept litter. This hasn’t been collected for more than three weeks and is now bags are being ripped open by animals and spilling out onto the street. Please clear this up immediately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roydene Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
